name: Seasons (Mario Mingoia)
description:
Artist 1 - Ermal (Modelling Level + Environment)

Artist 2 - Keir (Modelling Collectables + buildings)

Games Designer - Mario Mingoia (Spring Level)

Games Designer - Mohammed Saihaan (Winter Level)

Games Designer - Emilios Andreou(Summer Level)

Set in a park surrounded by buildings similar. 3 different seasons with their own unique collectibles. Winter (Snowballs), Spring (Easter eggs), and Summer (flowers). Scene transitions after the max of 5 are reached and the player goes to a bench which transitions to the next scene. Each season has a new attraction fitting in with the season.
